title: About Us
description: Learn about Pathon's mission, features, and team

sections.titleText: Welcome to Pathon ‚Äî Where Learning Meets Opportunity
sections.content: Pathon isn't just another edtech platform. It's a movement. A digital space where anyone can teach, everyone can learn, and knowledge flows without boundaries.
sections.subtitle: Born out of a simple belief ‚Äî 'education should be accessible, empowering, and community-driven' ‚Äî Pathon is reshaping how learning happens in the modern world.

leftContent.title: A Platform Built on Community
leftContent.description: Pathon is an open and inclusive online learning ecosystem where users seamlessly transition between being students and instructors. We've eliminated the traditional barriers to education, creating a space where knowledge exchange happens organically.
leftContent.highlight: Dual-role System: Learn today, teach tomorrow.

items.title: Mission
items.description: To democratize education by empowering anyone with knowledge to become an instructor and making quality learning accessible to everyone.

items.title: Vision
items.description: To create a world where education knows no boundaries, where every individual can both learn and contribute to the collective knowledge of humanity.

sections.title: Our Core Features
sections.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed for modern learning experiences

features.title: Recorded Classes
features.description: Upload pre-recorded video lessons with unlimited lifetime access for students. Perfect for in-depth learning at your own pace.

features.title: Live Interactive Classes
features.description: Host real-time sessions with interactive whiteboards, screen sharing, and live Q&A. Create engaging virtual classroom experiences.

features.title: Problem Solving Hub
features.description: Students submit academic challenges as images or PDFs. Get personalized solutions from educators or schedule one-on-one help sessions.

features.title: Flexible Monetization
features.description: Support for local payment gateways (bKash, Nagad, Rocket) with negotiable pricing models. Earn as you teach with transparent revenue sharing.

features.title: Course Privacy Controls
features.description: Choose between public courses for community access or private courses with invitation-only links. Perfect for corporate training and exclusive workshops.

features.title: Progress Analytics
features.description: Track student engagement, course completion rates, and learning patterns with detailed analytics for both learners and instructors.
